name: Geography & Setting Worksheet
description: Guided questions to help writers build a fictional world's geography, climate, and setting.

questions.question: What is the name of your world or main region?
What kind of landforms does it have? (Mountains, deserts, rivers, etc.)
What is the climate or weather like in different regions?
Are there any major cities, capitals, or settlements? Where are they located?
What kind of transportation is used? Are roads, rivers, or portals common?
What borders or natural barriers divide different areas (like oceans or magical fields)?
Are there any important historical landmarks, ruins, or mythic locations?
Does the setting have a theme, tone, or inspiration (e.g., Viking saga, desert survival, steampunk metropolis)?
